title: Everyday I Have the Blues
lyrics:
Everyday, everyday I have the blues
Everyday, everyday I have the blues
When you see me worryin' baby, yeah it's you I hate to lose
Nobody loves me, nobody seems to care
Nobody loves me, nobody seems to care

Talk about bad luck and trouble

Man you know I've had my share



Seems everyday, everyday I have the blues

Every every every everyday, everyday I have the blues

When you see me worryin' baby, it means, it's you I hate to lose



Gotta pack my suitcase, move on down the line

Gotta pack my suitcase, and gotta move on down the line

Yeah nobody worrin' about me, and nobody even tryin'



Everyday, everyday I've got the blues

Everyday, everyday I've got the blues

When you see me worryin' that means, that means I've got nothing to lose



Everyday

Everyday, I have the blues

When you see me worryin' baby, you I hate to lose



Everyday

Everyday, I have the blues

Everyday

Everyday, I have the blues

When you see me worryin' baby, you I hate to lose

You I hate to lose everyday
